MS.S: WIM Witch is a GUI driven tool used to update and customize Windows_x000A_Image (WIM) files and ISOs. It can also create WIM configuration templates and_x000A_apply them either with the GUI or programatically for bulk creation. WIM Witch_x000A_works as a stand alone tool, as well as integrating with Configuration Manager_x000A__x000A_version 3.3.5_x000A_-Adds dad joke button (requires -HiHungyImDad parameter to enable)_x000A__x000A_version 3.3.4 _x000A_-fixed bug that had demo mode as default_x000A__x000A_version 3.3.3_x000A_-Fixed bug that prompted for extra Win10 version check_x000A_-Added demo variable (disables LP's and LCU application)

WIM Witch is a GUI driven tool used to update and customize Windows_x000A_Image (WIM) files and ISOs. It can also create WIM configuration templates and_x000A_apply them either with the GUI or programatically for bulk creation. WIM Witch_x000A_works as a stand alone tool, as well as integrating with Configuration Manager_x000A__x000A_version 3.3.5_x000A_-Adds dad joke button (requires -HiHungyImDad parameter to enable)_x000A__x000A_version 3.3.4 _x000A_-fixed bug that had demo mode as default_x000A__x000A_version 3.3.3_x000A_-Fixed bug that prompted for extra Win10 version check_x000A_-Added demo variable (disables LP's and LCU application)
